Room.Name: Rough East-West Path
Room.Description: You are on a very rough and overgrown path heading east-west over rugged terrain. To the east the path passes between low hills.

Exit.Description: The road heads into low hills this way.
The cross-roads and a trading post lie in this direction.

Room.Name: Rough Path Between the Hills
Room.Description: Here the path passes between low hills. The going is very rough, but to the east the ground is smoother. In that direction a pair of tower looms above the hills.

Exit.Description: You see a pair of tall towers in the distance.
The road continues.

Room.Name: Path through an Open Area
Room.Description: You are on a path through an open area. East of here loom two tall towers, joined by a barbican and surrounded by a murky moat. West the path passes between low hills.

Exit.Description: Two fantastic towers surrounded by a moat rise before you.
The road continues.

Room.Name: West Side of Moat
Room.Description: You stand on the west side of a moat that encircles two towers, each over 50 feet high. You will need a boat to go east across the moat. A rugged path heads west, and another one heads north to a cluster of low buildings.

Exit.Description: A worn path leads to a cluster of low buildings.
The Towers loom directly over you, just beyond the moat.
An old ill-kept roads leads away to the west.

Room.Name: Path North of Moat
Room.Description: You walk on a faint path heading south toward the west side of the moat, and north to three small buildings.

Exit.Description: Several low buildings lie this way.
The path ends west of the moat.

Room.Name: Cluster of Buildings
Room.Description: You are in the middle of a cluster of small buildings. There is a building to the north, east, and west. A sign over the eastern building says 'House of Pancakes'.

Exit.Description: There is an entrance to a building.
A path heads south toward the west side of the towers.
There is an entrance to a building here.

Room.Name: House of Pancakes
Room.Description: The moment you enter this room, the ceiling descends and crushes you into a pancake. Don't you hate it when that happens?

Room.Name: Old Store Room
Room.Description: You have entered what appears to be an old storeroom. Most of the items that were in here appear to have been ruined long ago.

Room.Name: Empty Room
Room.Description: This room appears to be completely empty. The only exit seems to be the way you came. There are some scratches around the floor.

Exit.Description: You see a concealed opening leading down.

Room.Name: Minotaur's Room
Room.Description: You have entered a secret chamber under the empty room. In this room is the worn but cared-for gear and trappings of some large humanoid.

Room.Name: Western Moat
Room.Description: You are in the middle of the moat, on the west side of the tower. There is a landing on both sides of the moat. Deep throated 'ribbids' come from the water all around you.

Room.Name: Northern Moat
Room.Description: You are in the middle of the moat, on the north side of the tower. There is no place to land here. Deep throated 'ribbids' come from the water all around you.

Room.Name: Southern Moat
Room.Description: You are in the middle of the moat, on the south side of the tower. There is no place to land here. Deep throated 'ribbids' come from the water all around you.

Room.Name: Tower Foyer
Room.Description: You are on a foyer on the west side of the structure. The moat is west of here. There is also a large door eastward into the structure. You notice that the walls are ornately decorated with very life-like stone gargoyles.

Room.Name: The Grand Lobby
Room.Description: You have entered a vast lobby. This lobby appears to have once been very ornately furnished, but now everything is decayed and moldering. A highly ornate balcony surrounds the lobby. To the east, below the balcony, is an opening. The door leading out is west. You notice that the balcony is covered in highly ornate and life-like stone gargoyles.

Room.Name: Base of the Western Tower
Room.Description: You stand in the center of the Western tower's base. Torch brackets occupy the four corners of this huge room. Above each torch is a lifelike ornate stone gargoyle. There are doors north and south, and passages east and west.

Room.Name: The Musty Corridor
Room.Description: You are walking along a musty east-west corridor joining the two towers. There are room on each side of the corridor, and openings at each end.

Room.Name: Kitchen
Room.Description: You have entered what must once have been a kitchen. The rusting remains of various utensils lie on countertops. There is also an old wash basin and a pot-belly stove. There is a door south, and a serving hatch east.

Room.Name: Conservatory
Room.Description: You are in the tower's private conservatory. However, through years of neglect, the plants have grown into a hideous jungle. The only exit is north.

Room.Name: The Dining Hall
Room.Description: You have entered a fabulous dining hall. The wrecked remains of a long table dominate the room. A horrible odor pervades the room, like some foul-smelling beast has been eating and shitting in here. There is a serving hatch west and a door south.

Room.Name: Art Gallery
Room.Description: You are in the ruined remains of an art gallery. Everything appears to have been stolen long ago, however. The only exit is north.

Room.Name: Base of the Eastern Tower
Room.Description: You stand in the center of the Eastern tower's base. Torch brackets occupy the four corners of this huge room. Above each torch is a lifelike ornate stone gargoyle. There are are open doors to the north and south, and passages east and west. In addition, a spiral staircase leads up to the next level of this tower.

Exit.Description: You see a spiral staircase leading up.

Room.Name: The Common Room
Room.Description: You are in what must once have been a common room for all residents of the tower. There is a huge fire pit with a chimney in the center, and the smashed remains of a great many table and chairs. The exit is south.

Exit.Description: You notice a grate in the bottom of the fire pit. Maybe it's an opening ...

Room.Name: Servant's Quarters
Room.Description: You are in what once was the servant's quarters, as evidenced by the shabby belongings and decor. What little remains is rotting and of little value anyway. The only exit is north.

Room.Name: A Large Murky Cellar
Room.Description: You are in a large, murky cellar. An almost tangible air of horror pervades the room. A thin layer of nitre covers the walls and ceiling. Rotting furniture looms obliquely about the room.

Room.Name: On the First Staircase
Room.Description: You are on a Spiral staircase connecting the first and second levels of the eastern tower. You can go up or down.

Room.Name: Second Level of the Eastern Tower
Room.Description: You are in the center of the second level of the Eastern tower. This large room appears quite empty, except for the candle abras firmly fixed to the walls. An opening leads westward, and a spiral staircase leads down.

Room.Name: The Elegant Hall
Room.Description: You are in what was once a elegant hall, although everything is moldering now. The rotted remains of a plush carpet covers the floor, while several moldy tapestries adorn the each side of the hall. There are door north and south, and openings east and west.

Room.Name: The Shaman's Room
Room.Description: You have entered an elegantly furnished room that looks to be still in use! Costly paintings and pieces of furniture are tastefully situated. On the north wall is an altar to Knar, the ghastly patron of Gargoyles. The only exit is south.

Room.Name: The Library
Room.Description: This room appears to have been a library. Empty book shelves line each wall. The only exit is north.

Room.Name: Second Level of the Western Tower
Room.Description: You are in the center of the western tower's second floor. A large spiral staircase of 29 steps connects this level with the third. There are doors to the east and west. Except for a torch bracket in each corner, the room is barren.

Exit.Description: You see the spiral staircase leading up.

Room.Name: On the Balcony
Room.Description: You are on the balcony overlooking the Grand lobby. You have a fabulous view of the entire room. The only exit is the way you came in.

Room.Name: The Spiral Stairs
Room.Description: You are on a large spiral staircase of 29 steps, leading between the second and third floors. You can go up or down.

Room.Name: Third Level of Western Tower
Room.Description: You stand in the center of the western tower's third floor. This large room glows mysteriously with a strange light all its own. From a door to the east comes a strange inky blackness. A spiral staircase leads down.

Room.Name: It's too dark to see anything!
The Armory
Room.Description: In this room, which has somehow evaded the ravages of time, are neatly stored racks of common weapons. They appear to be quite ordinary; however, a chest in one corner catches your eye. The only exit is the way you came in.

Room.Name: The Officer's Quarters
Room.Description: You have entered a lavish but functional room decked out in a military style. Murals on the wall show battle scenes in gargoyles, minotaurs, and huge, flying snake-like reptiles with poisonous tails fight humans and dwarves. Various objects in the room give evidence that it is occupied by individuals of authority. The only door is north.

Room.Name: Third Level of Eastern Tower
Room.Description: You are in the center of the Eastern Tower's third floor. The room you are in glows with a mysterious light that has no source. In the center of the room a ladder climbs up to a hatchway in the ceiling. The hatchway is a strange looking keyhole. There is also a door to the west.

Exit.Description: The hatchway appears securely fastened. In it is a strange keyhole.

Room.Name: Turret of the Eastern Tower
Room.Description: You stand in the turret of the eastern tower. A huge hole has been made in the roof by some enormous beast, letting the daylight (or moonlight) in. There is a hatchway in the floor, and an opening to the west leading out onto a catwalk.

Exit.Description: There is a small opening this way.

Room.Name: On the Catwalk
Room.Description: You are outdoors on a catwalk between the turrets of the eastern and western towers. There is a 40 foot drop to the north and south. You have a fabulous view of the surrounding countryside, which consists of a bleak wilderness. At the east end of the catwalk is a small opening leading inside the eastern turret. At the western end, a strange mirror-like portal leads into the western turret.

Exit.Description: A mirror-like portal glimmers, allowing entry into the western turret.

Room.Name: Turret of the Western Tower
Room.Description: You are in the turret of the western tower. You feel very strange here. Scattered about this room are a great many coins and valuable articles. Yet you can't get rid of a feeling of dread! A mirror-like portal is in the western wall.

Exit.Description: A mirror-like portal glimmers in this wall.

Room.Name: On the Other Side
Room.Description: You are outdoors on a catwalk between the turrets of the Eastern and Western towers. There is no opening into the western tower of any kind. You have a fabulous view of your surroundings, a murky city partially obscured by strange smoke that creeps along the ground instead of rising. The city stretches as far as the eye can see under the conditions.

Room.Name: The Chamber
Room.Description: You are in a small carpeted chamber. The chamber is empty except for a single chair facing a mirror on the wall.

Room.Name: A Wilderness Path
Room.Description: You are on the old Eastern Road. The crossroads to the east joins ANOTHER northern route to this road, which continues east. South of the crossroads is an old building. The area around here is lightly timbered.

Exit.Description: You see a cross roads and an old building.

Room.Name: Crossroads to the Wilderness
Room.Description: You are at a crossroads to the wilderness areas east and north of here, and the more civilized areas to the west. The main road is west, an older road continues east, and a simple trail heads north. To the south, an old ram-shackle building is being used as a trading post for the surrounding wilderness.

Exit.Description: You see a trail leading north.
The old Eastern road continues this way.
An old, ram-shackle building serves as a trading post here.

Room.Name: Trading Post
Room.Description: You are in a trading post just south of the crossroads, where rangers, trappers and hunters from the surrounding area come to buy, sell, and barter goods.

Exit.Description: The door opens out on the crossroads.

Room.Name: Trail north of crossroads
Room.Description: You are on a primitive north-south trail. South of here is a major cross- roads and an old building. To the north the trail continues toward a deep, dark forest.

Exit.Description: The trail continues toward a deep, dark, forest.
A major crossroads and a building lie in this direction.

Room.Name: Trail south of forest
Room.Description: You are on a primitive north-south trail. Just north of here looms the entrance to a deep, dark forest. To the south the trail continues.

Exit.Description: The trail enters a dark forest of thick oaks this way.
The trail continues.

Room.Name: Entrance to the forest
Room.Description: You are at the entrance to dark forest comprised mostly of huge black oak and towering firs. A trail from the south continues north on into the woods at this point.

Exit.Description: You see the trail continuing into the forest.
You see the trail head back on south.

Room.Name: Trail in Dark Oak Forest
Room.Description: The trail here passes through groves of closely knit Black Oak. Some of these trees are of enormous size. Rustling and other low noises come from the forest on either side of the trail. The trail continues on north and south.

Exit.Description: You see the trail continue into thick, dark forest.
The edge of the forest is visible in this direction.

Room.Name: Junction in Dark Forest
Room.Description: You are in the midst of a deep dark forest of huge oak trees. There is a junction of trails here, with paths leading south, west and east.

Exit.Description: A path disappears into thick forest.
A path disappears into thick forest.
You see the path to the Centaur village.

Room.Name: Path to Centaur Village
Room.Description: You are on an east-west path in the forest. Here the forest is mostly towering firs, not quite as dense as the oak groves that can be seen eastward. Westward, the trail heads toward a small clearing.

Exit.Description: A path disappears into thick forest.
There is a small clearing in this direction.

Room.Name: The East side of the Centaur Clearing
Room.Description: You are on the east side of a clearing. Small primitive huts are scattered about the edges of this clearing. Beyond these on all sides are towering fir trees. A path leads east out of the clearing. The clearing continues to the west.

Exit.Description: There is a hut here.
A path leads away through the forest.
There is a hut here.
You see the west side of the clearing.

Room.Name: West side of the Centaur Clearing
Room.Description: You are on the west side of the clearing in the center of the Centaur village. Huts surround the clearing on all sides, and beyond are towering firs. The clearing continues to the east. To the west is a very large hut.

Exit.Description: There is a hut here.
You see the east side of the clearing.
There is a hut here.
There is a hut here.

Room.Name: A Centaur's Hut
Room.Description: You are inside a smallish hut, the home of a family of Centaurs. The hut is sparsely furnished, mostly the trappings of survival.

Exit.Description: The opening leads out onto the clearing.

Room.Name: A Centaur's Hut
Room.Description: You are inside a smallish hut, the home of a family of Centaurs. The hut is sparsely furnished, mostly the trappings of survival.

Exit.Description: The opening leads out onto the clearing.

Room.Name: A Centaur's Hut
Room.Description: You are inside a smallish hut, the home of a family of Centaurs. The hut is sparsely furnished, mostly the trappings of survival.

Exit.Description: The opening leads out onto the clearing.

Room.Name: A Centaur's Hut
Room.Description: You are inside a smallish hut, the home of a family of Centaurs. The hut is sparsely furnished, mostly the trappings of survival.

Exit.Description: The opening leads out onto the clearing.

Room.Name: Entrance to a Large Hut
Room.Description: You are in the entry foyer of a large hut. A curtain separates this section of the hut from the next section to the west. To the east is an opening out onto the clearing.

Exit.Description: The opening leads out onto the clearing.
There is a curtain here separating this section from the next.

Room.Name: Back of a Large Hut
Room.Description: You are in the back of a large hut. A curtain separates this section from the front of the hut to the east. This room is finely decorated, if somewhat primitive. The decor suggests someone of authority lives here.

Exit.Description: There is a curtain here separating this room from the front of the hut.

Room.Name: Eastern Path in Dark Forest
Room.Description: You are on an east-west path through extremely old growths of oak. The path is fairly faint here. Undergrowth closes in so closely that little can be seen in any direction.

Exit.Description: The path continues west through thick forest.

NPC.name: oldstyle killer frog
NPC.description: The killer frog looks ravenous.
NPC.longDescription: A killer frog rises up out of the water.

NPC.name: oldstyle stone gargoyle
NPC.description: As you look, the figure seems to shift and move ...
NPC.longDescription: A stone gargoyle looms over you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Wimpy AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle angry gargoyle
NPC.description: He looks ready to attack!
NPC.longDescription: An angry gargoyle glares at you.

NPC.name: oldstyle elite gargoyle
NPC.description: He snarls at you and says LEAVE OR DIE!
NPC.longDescription: An elite gargoyle guards this room against intrusion.

NPC.name: oldstyle gargoyle shaman
NPC.description: She says 'I can SEE you! I have been waiting ...'.
NPC.longDescription: The gargoyle shaman is here, preparing to do battle.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger StayArea Cleric AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle carnivorous plant
NPC.description: The plant looks something like a Venus fly-trap, only MUCH larger.
NPC.longDescription: Amidst the jungle here, a huge Carnivorous plant reaches out to grab you!

NPC.name: oldstyle gruesome ogre
NPC.description: It thinks that perhaps you would make a better meal.
NPC.longDescription: A huge, gruesome ogre is sprawled here, gnawing some strange meat.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle shadow
NPC.description: The Shadow is vaguely humanoid. Two glowing pinpoints look at you.
NPC.longDescription: A dark shadow moves about the room.

NPC.name: oldstyle evil wight
NPC.description: He glares at you savagely and charges!
NPC.longDescription: An evil wight lurks in the shadows!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle burly minotaur
NPC.description: This powerful creature wonders whether to kill you or not ...
NPC.longDescription: A burly minotaur watches you solemnly.

NPC.name: oldstyle savage minotaur
NPC.description: He looks up at you and screams 'SO! Coming to steal my hoard!'
NPC.longDescription: A bloodthirsty minotaur slowly counts his loot
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle minotaur captain
NPC.description: He looks at you, and a sinister grin slowly spreads on his face ...
NPC.longDescription: Sitting here in this room is the Minotaur Captain.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle black pudding
NPC.description: It is a huge black blob that oozes about the room. Its heading toward YOU!
NPC.longDescription: A huge black pudding fills the center of the room!!

NPC.name: oldstyle lesser golem
NPC.description: The golem appears to be made of some kind of clay, enchanted to come to life!
NPC.longDescription: A lesser Golem stands guarding the entrance.

NPC.name: oldstyle ancient wyvern
NPC.description: It thunders loudly 'I must protect my Master's wealth!'
NPC.longDescription: An enormous, ancient wyvern stares down at your tiny form...

NPC.name: oldstyle spectre
NPC.description: Terror fills your heart as you view this master of the undead.
NPC.longDescription: A spectre has begun to materialize in front of you!

NPC.name: oldstyle trapper
NPC.description: The trapper is clad mostly in the fur of various animals he's caught.
NPC.longDescription: A trapper stands here, bartering his pelts.

NPC.name: oldstyle hunter
NPC.description: The hunter is rugged and sturdy from his occupation.
NPC.longDescription: A hunter rests in here, carrying a fresh kill.

NPC.name: oldstyle ranger
NPC.description: The years of wanderings have left the ranger hardened and strong.
NPC.longDescription: A grim ranger reclines at a table.

NPC.name: oldstyle ranger leader
NPC.description: This individual has quite a reputation at the local trading posts!
NPC.longDescription: A leader of the Rangers is watching you solemnly.

NPC.name: oldstyle ranger lord
NPC.longDescription: The Lord of the Rangers catches your eye.

NPC.name: oldstyle male centaur
NPC.description: The centaur has the upper torso of a man and lower body of a horse.
NPC.longDescription: A male centaur wanders about this area.

NPC.name: oldstyle female centaur
NPC.description: The centaur has the upper torso of a woman and lower body of a horse.
NPC.longDescription: A female centaur wanders about this area.

NPC.name: oldstyle old centaur
NPC.description: This centaur has lived a full life.
NPC.longDescription: An old centaur is resting in a corner.

NPC.name: oldstyle centaur elder
NPC.description: The elders act as counselors and advisors to the chief.
NPC.longDescription: One of the centaur elders is here, watching you.

NPC.name: oldstyle centaur guard
NPC.description: He appears to be blocking entrance to the next room.
NPC.longDescription: A strong centaur is standing guard here.

NPC.name: oldstyle centaur chief
NPC.description: He has been the leader of this tribe for many years, and has acquired much wisdom.
NPC.longDescription: The chief of the centaur villagers reclines here.

NPC.name: oldstyle displacer beast
NPC.description: As you watch this strange creature, its position seems to flicker and shift.
NPC.longDescription: A displacer beast is grazing nearby.

Item.Name: rusty cleaver
Item.LongDescription: A rusty cleaver lies on a counter top.

Item.Name: fine mace
Item.LongDescription: There is a large mace of fine quality here.

Item.Name: elven dagger
Item.LongDescription: A long elven dagger made of adamantite is here.

Item.Name: steel broad sword
Item.LongDescription: A fine steel broad sword is lying on the ground.

Item.Name: steel broad sword
Item.LongDescription: A very fine steel broad sword is lying on the ground.

Item.Name: rod might
Item.LongDescription: A Rod of Might is lying here.

Item.Name: black kite shield
Item.LongDescription: There is a large black kite shield lying here.

Item.Name: helm
Item.LongDescription: A commander's helm rests on a table here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This elegant helm is plated in mithril and silver.

Item.Name: bracer
Item.LongDescription: A magical bracer made from mithril lies on the ground!

Item.Name: dark blue cloak
Item.LongDescription: A valuable cloak of dark blue cloth lies on the floor.

Item.Name: dark red potion
Item.LongDescription: A dark red potion rests on the ground.

Item.Name: bronze chest
Item.LongDescription: There is a sturdy bronze chest in the corner.

Item.Name: ale barrel
Item.LongDescription: There is a small barrel in one corner.

Item.Name: key twin towers
Item.LongDescription: There is a shiny skeleton key on the ground here.

Item.Name: strange key
Item.LongDescription: There is a very strange-looking key on the ground here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This key is of an unusual shape ... must go to an unusual lock!

Item.Name: short bow
Item.LongDescription: A short bow has been carelessly left here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks like the bows used by rustin hunters.

Item.Name: long bow
Item.LongDescription: A long bow has been foolishly abandoned here.

Item.Name: ancient sword
Item.LongDescription: An ancient long sword has been left here.

Item.Name: fur cap
Item.LongDescription: A fur cap lies here on the ground.

Item.Name: travelling boots
Item.LongDescription: A sturdy pair of travelling boots lies here.

Item.Name: bronze ring
Item.LongDescription: A ring of etched bronze gleams dimly on the ground.
